product_entries.section_context_for_this_product_block: A. | FIRE PUMP ROOM | FIRE WATER PUMPING SYSTEM
product_entries.full_product_description: Supply, erection, fabrication, testing of MS black steel pipe Heavy grade of thickness 5.4mm conforming to IS : 1239 Part -1 & 7 mm Heavy grade conforming to IS : 3589 Part -1 including all fittings viz. Elbows, tees, flanges, etc. reduces clamps, MS support dash fasteners etc. including painting the pipe with two coats of approved primer and two coats of approved  paint. Pipe joints shall be grooved with groove coupling. All related civil work, supports etc shall be of vendor's scope. 350 mm NB x 7 mm thk
product_entries.feature_or_specifications: material: ms(mild steel), finish: black, grade: heavy, thickness: 7 mm, standard: is 3589 part-1(indian standard 3589 part-1), fittings: elbows, tees, flanges, reduces clamps, ms support dash fasteners, painting: two coats approved primer, two coats approved paint, joints: grooved with groove coupling, civil work: vendor's scope

product_entries.section_context_for_this_product_block: A. | FIRE PUMP ROOM | FIRE WATER PUMPING SYSTEM
product_entries.full_product_description: Supply & installation of SS 4 way collecting head with 63 mm dia instantaneous type inlet 150 dia flanged outlet with built in check valve for fire brigade connection to fire reservoir (IS : 904).
product_entries.size: inlet diameter: 63 mm, outlet diameter: 150 mm
product_entries.feature_or_specifications: material: ss(stainless steel), inlet-type: instantaneous, outlet-type: flanged, feature: built in check valve, application: fire brigade connection to fire reservoir, standard: is 904(indian standard 904)

product_entries.section_context_for_this_product_block: A. | FIRE PUMP ROOM | FIRE WATER PUMPING SYSTEM
product_entries.full_product_description: Supply & installation of SS Fire Brigade Draw out connection with necessary foot valve (150NB) for reservoir.
product_entries.feature_or_specifications: material: ss(stainless steel), application: reservoir, accessory: foot valve

product_entries.section_context_for_this_product_block: A. | FIRE PUMP ROOM | FIRE WATER PUMPING SYSTEM
product_entries.full_product_description: Priming arrangement of 8000ltrs capacity for negative suction to be provided by the erection vendor including necessary tank and other structural support. Valves required are indicated elsewhere.
product_entries.feature_or_specifications: feature: negative suction, vendor: erection vendor, accessory: necessary tank, accessory: structural support

product_entries.full_product_description: Supply,Installation, testing & commisssioning of CI Foot valve with Strainer 300 mm NB

product_entries.full_product_description: Supply, fabrication, erection & testing of GI CABLE TRAYS FOR LAYING ALL TYPE OF CABLES AS INDICATED ABOVE INCLUDING ALL NECESSARY STRUCTURAL SUPPORTS.
product_entries.feature_or_specifications: material: gi(galvanized iron), application: laying all type of cables, accessory: structural supports

original_rows.1: Supply & installation of SS 4 way collecting head with 63 mm dia instantaneous type inlet 150 dia flanged outlet with built in check valve for fire brigade connection to fire reservoir (IS : 904).
Supply & installation of SS Fire Brigade Draw out connection with necessary foot valve (150NB) for reservoir.
Priming arrangement of 8000ltrs capacity for negative suction to be provided by the erection vendor including necessary tank and other structural support. Valves required are indicated elsewhere.
Supply,Installation, testing & commisssioning of CI Foot valve with Strainer
Supply, fabrication, erection & testing of GI CABLE TRAYS FOR LAYING ALL TYPE OF CABLES AS INDICATED ABOVE INCLUDING ALL NECESSARY STRUCTURAL SUPPORTS.
